channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony has a poignant vibe this year
item.description: The Rock & Roll Hall Fame induction ceremony on Saturday night promises to be starry, jamming — and bittersweet. So many of the honorees this time have been lost.

item.title: Black male teachers are a rarity in preschools. This pioneering program wants to change that
item.description: A fellowship program is training young Black men to become literacy aides in preschool classrooms across the country.

item.title: Chumash people in California to co-steward marine sanctuary in historic partnership
item.description: For more than 10,000 years, Native Americans have been living along California’s central coast. Now the area will soon be part of a new national marine sanctuary that Native people will co-steward with the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.
